name: Kingdom of Keogth: the Arena
description:
In Keogth, The King doesn't want any squad to solve the matters of the Kingdom : he wants the best. From all around the world, adventurers form squads to come and confront in the specialy designed arenas.

Key Features

  • Customize each game: define the number of zones, opponents, adventurers in each squad! Make each game different.
  • Create your own squad of adventurers: select among the 26 portraits and 4 starting classes to build up a squad of up to 6 adventurers.
  • Make your way in the arena: all squads start on the same footing. Find or craft your own equipment. Use your abilities to detect other squads while remaining unseen, and make the difference.
  • Develop your own strategy: take the upper hand over your opponents in the battlegrounds, taking advantage of the environment and characters combinaisons.
  • Specialize your adventurers: unlock your skills to serve your tactics. Multiple paths exist in the skill tree, and gives many combinaison possibilities.
